![](https://eastlandtexas.gov/api/blob/viewBlob?i=5jFHQSqlw%252BtPPTV55BcvbJD7%252BFkRwjECmGLHLnsAARSRLXWfphwFZfgck9TyIPTj&s=xlarge)

City Registrar
City Registrar

This department provides certified birth and death certificates for those who were born or deceased within the City of Eastland. For those born or deceased outside the City of Eastland you must contact the Eastland County Clerk or the State of Texas.

<mwjspeople-obj></mwjspeople-obj><script type="module">import mwjsPeople from "https://app.membershipware.com/api/public/mwjsPeople?et=aTUykMGpQrgEUir%2fo5WQkg%3d%3d&eb=EIusSBvRdER57ow9MpxAXQ%3d%3d";</script>

Texas state law requires identifying information to obtain a certified birth or death certificate:

* Full name of the individual on the Birth/Death Certificate
* Full name of the father on the Birth Certificate, if listed
* Full maiden name of the mother on the Birth Certificate, if listed
* Your current Driver License or state-issued Identification Card
* Your Social Security number

To expedite your order print and complete this [**FORM**](https://eastlandtexas.gov/formsandpermits?def2=snaBt55siO00OccdOBkFbA%3D%3D) and return it in person or by mail with the required fee and documentation to:

**REGISTRAR:**  
CITY OF EASTLAND  
P. O. Box 749  
Eastland, TX 76448

For online ordering of a birth or death certificate from the State of Texas click [**here**](javascript:;)

![](https://eastlandtexas.gov/api/blob/viewBlob?i=j2buMcRAMrdeLCPwpEqP3kU%2FW4HIgOILvU059c342I7yFWSSawczCh4OTjHzF1yb&s=large)

113 E. Commerce, Eastland, TX 76448  
[(254) 629-8321](tel:2546298321) | [citysec@eastlandtexas.gov](mailto:citysec@eastlandtexas.gov)

**What is a Passkey?**  
Imagine signing into your account as easily as unlocking your phone—no more worrying about remembering or typing a password. A passkey is a secure digital key that uses the safety features in your device to keep your account protected. It’s designed to be both simple to use and highly secure.  
Ready to experience a simpler, safer sign-in? Click the button above to create your passkey now.
